ModMetaData.name: COTR
ModMetaData.author: AmDeth
ModMetaData.description:
[!!!] THIS MOD IS AN OVERHAUL KIND OF MOD! [!!!] Do not expect compatability outside of what is explicitly listed at the bottom.
[!!!] THIS MOD IS IN VERY EARLY STAGES [!!!] Please leave a comment in the steam worshop if you find a bug, have an idea, or want to contribute.
//==========| Description |=========//
"Cataclysm on the Rim" is a project that plans to add further progression to rimworld, along with just more things in general.
some features that may be found in this mod will eventually be split up into its own module when i get to it.
//==========| Content |=========//
- 3 (6?) New weapons - 3 New resources
- 7 (8?) Research projects
- 2 buildings
//==========| Compatability |=========// [X]: Not planned to make compatable / Not Intended to be played with. [O]: planned to make compatable, but havent gotten to it. [I]: Technically Compatable. [V]: Compatable and implemented special features.
- [X] Combat Extended - [X] Z-Levels - [X] GlitterTech - [X] GlitterNet - [X] Quality Bionics - [X] Z-Levels - [X] More Batteries - [X] Advanced Hydroponics
- [I] SOS/SOS2
